name: 7th International conference on Advanced Research in Management, Economics and Accounting
content: Designed for professionals aiming to elevate their expertise in management, economics, and accounting, this conference delivers essential insights into current trends, methods, and tools in these fields. Attendees will have the chance to showcase their research, engage in diverse discussions, and explore publication avenues, all while networking globally. With added features like guided city tours, it’s an excellent blend of professional and cultural enrichment for anyone dedicated to advancing in these sectors. Conference Highlights Innovative Research and Learning: Leading experts and academics converge to present the latest developments and strategies across management, economics, and accounting. Participants will gain exposure to cutting-edge methods that drive industry progress. Valuable Networking: Connect with global professionals, exchange ideas, and collaborate with peers passionate about driving change and innovation in these fields. Comprehensive Topics: With a broad agenda covering everything from financial management to economic policy, the event is ideal for professionals across all career levels. This dynamic mix of current knowledge, networking, and growth opportunities makes it an event not to miss for anyone committed to shaping the future of management, economics, and accounting. What to Expect at the Conference Keynote Speakers: Industry thought leaders will share valuable insights that can elevate your approach and broaden your strategies. Flexible Presentation Formats: Present your research either in person or virtually. We offer presentation options to suit your preference, allowing you to reach a global audience in the format that works best for you. Publishing Opportunities: Accepted & registered papers will be published in the Conference Proceedings, complete with an ISBN, and there’s a chance for select works to be featured in reputable indexed journals. Important Dates to Remember Abstract Submission Deadline: May 30, 2025 Early Bird Registration Deadline: December 10, 2024 Early Registration Deadline: March 10, 2025 Late Registration Deadline: June 10, 2025 Conference Dates: June 20-22, 2025 Who Should Attend? If you’re invested in leadership, financial analysis, and market dynamics, this conference is crafted for you. Consider attending if you are: A Senior Executive or Manager: Keeping up-to-date with advanced strategies and industry shifts. A Finance or HR Specialist: Looking to enhance your approaches to financial management or workforce development. An Academic or Researcher: Eager to present your research and network with industry pioneers. A Student or Emerging Professional: Ready to learn from experienced experts and broaden your professional connections. Additional Highlights Scientific Review Process: All abstracts are reviewed by the Scientific Committee to ensure high standards. Submissions should present original findings and adhere to the conference’s formatting guidelines. Exclusive Social Events: Participate in our special social events and enjoy a guided city tour of Nice, allowing you to connect with other academics in a friendly and informal setting. Don’t miss your chance to be part of this transformative event! Register now to reserve your place among industry leaders and academics. Spaces are limited, so act quickly to take advantage of the inspiring sessions, valuable networking, and unique experiences offered at this conference. Take the next step in your professional journey—register today!
